title: Indonesian-Style Chicken Thigh Rendang with Green Bead Rice
keywords: Rendang, Chicken thigh, Indonesian, Green bean rice, Spicy, Coconut

method.step: Before you start cooking, take your chicken out of the bridge, open the packet and let it air
Trim, then cut your green beans in half
Bash your lemongrass with a rolling pin, cut down the middle lengthways, remove the tough out layers and set aside for later, then roughly chop the softer inner cores(s)
Add your basmati rice and your cold water and the touch outer lemongrass layers to a pot with a lid and bring to the boil over a heigh heat
Once boiling, reduce the heat to low and add the chopped green beans
Cook covered for 10-12 minutes or until all the water has been absorbed and the rice and green beans are cooked
Once done, remove from heat and keep covered until serving. This is your green been rice
While the rice and beans are cooking peel ad quarter your shallot
Crush your cardamon pods open by squashing them with the side of a knife and discard the outer green skins
Add your cardamon seeds, soft inner core of the lemon grass and chopped shallot to a food processor with your crushed garlic and ginger paste
Add half your chilli flakes with your ground cinnamon and your sugar and blitz until smooth.  This is your rendang paste
Heat a large, wide based pan with a drizzle of vegetable oil over a medium heigh heat
Once hot, add your diced chicken thigh and cook for a further 6 minutes or until your chicken stock mix and fish sauce.  This is your coconut stock

Once the chicken this are browed, add the coconut stock and cook for a further 10-12 minutes or until the chicken is cooked through and the sauce is thickened.  This is your Indonesian style chicken Thai rendang
Fluff the green bean rice with a fork serve the Indonesian style chicken Thai rendang over the green bean rice and garnish with your remaining chilli flakes
